
<p>Demonstrates the use of the ReSTIR reservoir sampling technique to interactively sample direct lighting from thousands to millions of dynamic emissive triangles.</p>
<p>Leverages a biased estimator to further improve the results as shown below with a 35-65x speedup (albeit with some energy loss).</p>
<p><img src="https://research.nvidia.com/sites/default/files/publications/piratesTeaser_nvrSite_scaled.png" alt="teaser"></p>
